user.title: Ecowitt Local Setup
user.description: Configure your Ecowitt gateway connection. Enter the IP address of your Ecowitt gateway device.

data_description.host: IP address or hostname of the Ecowitt gateway (e.g., 192.168.1.100)
data_description.password: Password for the gateway web interface (leave blank if none)

options.title: Ecowitt Local Options
options.description: Configure polling intervals and sensor options.

data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll for live data (30-300 seconds)
data_description.mapping_interval: How often to refresh sensor mappings (300-3600 seconds)
data_description.include_inactive: Include sensors that are currently offline or have no data

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the gateway. Please check the IP address and ensure the gateway is accessible.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid password. Please check the gateway password.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

init.title: Ecowitt Local Options
init.description: Configure polling intervals and sensor options.

data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll for live data (30-300 seconds)
data_description.mapping_interval: How often to refresh sensor mappings (300-3600 seconds)
data_description.include_inactive: Include sensors that are currently offline or have no data

refresh_mapping.name: Refresh Sensor Mapping
refresh_mapping.description: Force refresh of sensor hardware ID mapping from the gateway

update_data.name: Update Live Data
update_data.description: Force immediate update of live sensor data from the gateway
